title: LevelBlue Acquires Trustwave, Forms World's Largest Independent MSSP
summary: LevelBlue Acquires Trustwave, Forms World's Largest Independent MSSP. As the largest managed security services provider, the combined entity will offer cyber consulting, managed detection and response, and incident response services....
content: As the largest managed security services provider, the combined entity will offer cyber consulting, managed detection and response, and incident response services.
